template.name: Template Cisco ASR 9K Health SNMP
template.description: Template Cisco ASR 9k Health -CPU -Memory -Power Supply -Temperature ( RSP e LC ) -FAN ( FAN and FANTray ) -Power Consumption By: Flavio Gomes Figueira Camacho Junior Require: Firmware / Software .IOS XR 5.3.1 .IOS XR 5.3.4 ValueMap .CISCO-ENTITY-FRU-CONTROL-MIB::PowerOperType .ENTITY-SENSORS-MIB::EntitySensorStatus .CISCO-ENTITY-FRU-CONTROL-MIB::CefcFanTrayStatusEntry .CISCO-ENTITY-SENSOR-MIB::SensorStatus Base: CISCO-MEMORY-POOL-MIB.mib http://www.circitor.fr/Mibs/Html/C/CISCO-MEMORY-POOL-MIB.php CISCO-PROCESS-MIB.mib http://www.circitor.fr/Mibs/Html/C/CISCO-PROCESS-MIB.php ENTITY-MIB http://www.circitor.fr/Mibs/Html/E/ENTITY-MIB.php CISCO-ENTITY-FRU-CONTROL-MIB.mib https://circitor.fr/Mibs/Html/C/CISCO-ENTITY-FRU-CONTROL-MIB.php CISCO-ENTITY-SENSOR-MIB.mib http://www.circitor.fr/Mibs/Html/C/CISCO-ENTITY-SENSOR-MIB.php https://share.zabbix.com/network_devices/cisco/template-cisco-asr-9k External Scripts and Value Mapping on my Github: https://github.com/flaviojunior1995/Zabbix-Templates

discovery_rule.name: Memory Pool Discovery
discovery_rule.description: CISCO-MEMORY-POOL-MIB::ciscoMemoryPoolName A textual name assigned to the memory pool.

item_prototype.name: Free memory on Memory Pool "$1"
item_prototype.description: CISCO-MEMORY-POOL-MIB::ciscoMemoryPoolFree Indicates the number of bytes from the memory pool that are currently unused on the managed device.

item_prototype.name: Used memory on Memory Pool "$1"
item_prototype.description: CISCO-MEMORY-POOL-MIB::ciscoMemoryPoolUsed Indicates the number of bytes from the memory pool that are currently in use by applications on the managed device.

item_prototype.name: Utilization on Memory Pool "$1"
item_prototype.description: CISCO-MEMORY-POOL-MIB::ciscoMemoryPoolUtilization5Min This is the memory pool utilization for 5 minutes.

trigger_prototype.expression: ( {Template Cisco ASR 9K Health SNMP:ciscoMemoryPoolUsed["{#SNMPVALUE}"].last()} * 100 ) / {Template Cisco ASR 9K Health SNMP:ciscoMemoryPoolTotal["{#SNMPVALUE}"].last()} > {$MEMORY_HIGH_ALARM}
trigger_prototype.name: High memory utilizarion alarm on Pool "{#SNMPVALUE}"

discovery_rule.name: CPU Discovery
discovery_rule.description: CISCO-PROCESS-MIB::cpmCPUTotalPhysicalIndex The entPhysicalIndex of the physical entity for which the CPU statistics in this entry are maintained. The physical entity can be a CPU chip, a group of CPUs, a CPU card etc. The exact type of this entity is described by its entPhysicalVendorType value. If the CPU statistics in this entry correspond to more than one physical entity (or to no physical entity), or if the entPhysicalTable is not supported on the SNMP agent, the value of this object must be zero.

item_prototype.name: CPU #$1 Usage 1min Rev
item_prototype.description: CISCO-PROCESS-MIB::cpmCPUTotal1minRev The overall CPU busy percentage in the last 1 minute period. This object deprecates the object cpmCPUTotal1min and increases the value range to (0..100).

item_prototype.name: CPU #$1 Usage 5min Rev
item_prototype.description: CISCO-PROCESS-MIB::cpmCPUTotal5minRev The overall CPU busy percentage in the last 5 minute period. This object deprecates the object cpmCPUTotal5min and increases the value range to (0..100).

discovery_rule.name: FAN Sensor Discovery
discovery_rule.description: The textual name of the physical entity.

item_prototype.name: Status of FAN Sensor "{#SNMPVALUE}"/{#SNMPINDEX}
item_prototype.description: CISCO-ENTITY-SENSOR-MIB::entSensorStatus This variable indicates the present operational status of the sensor.

item_prototype.name: Speed of FAN Sensor "{#SNMPVALUE}"/{#SNMPINDEX}
item_prototype.description: CISCO-ENTITY-SENSOR-MIB::entSensorValue This variable reports the most recent measurement seen by the sensor.

discovery_rule.name: FAN Tray Sensor Discovery
discovery_rule.description: The textual name of the physical entity.

item_prototype.name: Operational Status of "$1"
item_prototype.description: CISCO-ENTITY-FRU-CONTROL-MIB::cefcFanTrayOperStatus The operational state of the fan or fan tray.

trigger_prototype.name: Status of "{#SNMPVALUE}" is in partial failure

discovery_rule.name: Temperature LC Discovery
discovery_rule.description: The textual name of the physical entity.

item_prototype.name: Status of Temperature Sensor "$1"
item_prototype.description: CISCO-ENTITY-SENSOR-MIB::entSensorStatus This variable indicates the present operational status of the sensor.

item_prototype.name: Temperature on Sensor "$1"
item_prototype.description: CISCO-ENTITY-SENSOR-MIB::entSensorValue This variable reports the most recent measurement seen by the sensor.

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Cisco ASR 9K Health SNMP:entSensorValue["{#SNMPVALUE}","Temperature LC"].last()}>{Template Cisco ASR 9K Health SNMP:entSensorThresholdValue["{#SNMPVALUE}","Temperature LC","Alarm"].last()}
trigger_prototype.name: High Temperature Alarm "{#SNMPVALUE}"

discovery_rule.name: Power Supply Sensors Discovery
discovery_rule.description: The textual name of the physical entity.

item_prototype.name: Current Supplied by PowerSupply "$1"
item_prototype.description: CISCO-ENTITY-FRU-CONTROL-MIB::cefcFRUCurrent Current supplied by the FRU (positive values) or current required to operate the FRU (negative values).

trigger_prototype.name: Connector rating exceeded on Power Supply "{#SNMPVALUE}"
Cooling capacity is insufficient on Power Supply "{#SNMPVALUE}"
System power is insufficient on Power Supply "{#SNMPVALUE}"

discovery_rule.name: Power Supply Current (A) Discovery
discovery_rule.description: The textual name of the physical entity.

discovery_rule.name: Power Supply Voltage (V) Discovery
discovery_rule.description: The textual name of the physical entity.

discovery_rule.name: Temperature RSP Discovery
discovery_rule.description: The textual name of the physical entity.

item_prototype.name: Status of Temperature Sensor "$1"
item_prototype.description: CISCO-ENTITY-SENSOR-MIB::entSensorStatus This variable indicates the present operational status of the sensor.

item_prototype.name: Temperature on Sensor "$1"
item_prototype.description: CISCO-ENTITY-SENSOR-MIB::entSensorValue This variable reports the most recent measurement seen by the sensor.

trigger_prototype.expression: {Template Cisco ASR 9K Health SNMP:entSensorValue["{#SNMPVALUE}","Temperature RSP"].last()}>{Template Cisco ASR 9K Health SNMP:entSensorThresholdValue["{#SNMPVALUE}","Temperature RSP","Alarm"].last()}
trigger_prototype.name: High Temperature Alarm "{#SNMPVALUE}"
